Title: Requires social services districts to establish a homeless housing task force for purposes of developing a ten year plan and guidelines
Summary: Requires social services districts to establish a homeless housing task force for purposes of developing a ten-year plan and guidelines to address long-term and short-term housing.
LawCode: Add ยง50-a, amd ยง50, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to the creation by each social services district of a homeless housing task force
